channel.title: OIL — Auxy Tributes EP [EP]
channel.description:
Remember those demo tracks that came with the version of Auxy that was around maybe five years ago?
I do.
[After finding the demo project thread with those very same demos, I couldn’t help myself and remixed a few of them. Here they are.](https://soundcloud.com/oil-official/sets/auxy-tributes-ep)
Hope you enjoy, somewhat. While it’s not my best work, it’s more sentimental to me than anything.
*Five years,* y’know?

item.title: OIL — Auxy Tributes EP [EP]
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
I’d like your version of Toast and would be interested to hear it developed further.
I think the vibe has legs.

Read full topic
